Internet connection speeds in Nigeria in 2025
Social media statistics for Nigeria in 2025
bullets: A total of 150 million cellular mobile connections were active in Nigeria in early 2025, with this figure equivalent to 64.0¬†percent of the total population. However, note that some of these connections may only include services such as voice and SMS, and some may not include access to the internet.
There were 107 million individuals using the internet in Nigeria at the start of 2025, when online penetration stood at 45.4¬†percent .
Nigeria was home to 38.7 million social media user identities in January¬†2025, equating to 16.4¬†percent of the total population.
Median mobile internet download speed via cellular data networks * : 18.91 Mbps .
Median fixed internet download speed: 22.44 Mbps .
